dcterms:description: A layout QA dataset proposed to test the layout understanding capability of LLMs. This dataset revolves around enumerating items from various shopping lists arranged in random orientations within the text canvas.
dcterms:title: TextLayoutQA

dcterms:creator: Y. Xu
T. Lv
L. Cui
G. Wang
Y. Lu
D. Florencio
C. Zhang
F. Wei
dcterms:description: A form QA dataset generated from the XFUND dataset, which is a multilingual form understanding benchmark dataset covering 7 languages with manually annotated forms.
dcterms:title: XfundQA

dcterms:creator: L. Nan
C. Hsieh
Z. Mao
X. V. Lin
N. Verma
R. Zhang
W. Krýsciński
H. Schoelkopf
R. Kong
X. Tang
dcterms:description: A table QA dataset consisting of free-form table questions that require deep reasoning and understanding.
dcterms:title: FetaQA

dcterms:creator: M. Mathew
D. Karatzas
C. Jawahar
dcterms:description: A document QA dataset consisting of printed and typed text as well as scanned documents with various layouts.
dcterms:title: DocVQA

dcterms:description: An instruction-tuning dataset designed to diminish the text layout understanding capability of LLMs.
dcterms:title: Instruction-basic

dcterms:description: An instruction-tuning dataset designed to verify the influence of the code corpora on the text layout understanding capability of LLMs.
dcterms:title: Instruction-code

dcterms:description: An instruction-tuning dataset designed to verify the influence of the table corpora on the text layout understanding capability of LLMs.
dcterms:title: Instruction-table

dcterms:description: An instruction-tuning dataset designed to improve the text layout understanding capability of LLMs through a novel text game.
dcterms:title: Instruction-generated

dcterms:description: A testing dataset designed to assess the efficacy of instruction tuning.
dcterms:title: Instruction-test
